thread.title: Facebook is looking for engineers to build its own chips

title: Facebook is looking for engineers to build its own chips
text: Facebook is looking for engineers to build its own chips Jordan Novet Reblog A job listing says Facebook is looking for a manager who can build a chip team. Facebook FB has begun putting together a team of people who can work on chip designs, Bloomberg reported shortly before market close on Wednesday. An SOC (system-on-a-chip) is a general concept for chip architectures, and is commonly used in the design of chips for mobile devices, while an ASIC (application-specific integrated circuit) refers to a chip designed for a special purpose.
